title: Reef Beach Club Leisure (Half-day)
overview: Relax at Reef Beach Club with beachfront dining, a swimming pool, and live music at Peninsula Beach Nusa Dua.

stops.description: Arrive, swim, and enjoy the sun loungers.
Lunch at the club's restaurant with ocean views.

title: Reef Beach Club Day (Full-day)
overview: A full day of relaxation and fun at Reef Beach Club, including water sports, live music, and great food.

stops.description: Arrive, swim, and enjoy water sports or sunbathing.
Lunch with a view of the ocean.
Participate in water sports or relax by the pool.
